concept.title: Shanks Hall's Frozen Dessert Machine
concept.shortdesc: Shanks Hall has a new Frozen Dessert Machine for students and faculty!

conbody.p: In an effort to keep students happy, the English Department has decided to install a frozen dessert machine into the classroom. This way, students and faculty will be able to enjoy a refreshing treat during the school day. All the ingredients and tools needed to ensure a quality dessert experience can be found in the kitchen in Shanks 380.
